example.name: checkboxes-and-arraymap
example.synopsis: Using an arraymap to draw a set of checkboxes
example.description:
When WSForm is used inside another parser function, you can use 

{{#tag:wsfield }}

instead of 

<wsfield>

..
example.example:
{{#arraydefine:role options|organizer,participant,contact,user}} {{#arraydefine:role selected|organizer,user}} {{#arraymap: {{#arrayprint:role options}}|,|_Item_|{{#tag:wsfield ||type=checkbox |name=Role2[] |value=_Item_ |id=_Item_-checkbox2 |checked={{#arraysearch:role selected |_Item_ |0|checked}} }} {{#tag:wslabel |{{ucfirst:_Item_}}|for=_Item_-checkbox2}}|
}}
